Package cz.ive.manager

Class of main Manager of Senses and supporting classes to manage queries among objects and their actualization.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ManagerOfSenses In our implementation, only one instance of manager is created and it's accesible by static class member 'manager'.
QTQuery Box of passive query.
QTUpdate Box of passive update.
QueryData Holder of query data - stores tree of expression, role identifier
QueryTrigger  
 

Enum Summary
ManagerOfSenses.ReturnSet Flags to specify how will be filled objects returned by query to manager
 

Package cz.ive.manager Description

Class of main Manager of Senses and supporting classes to manage queries among objects and their actualization. Specialized triggers are defined to provides information to callers.
